Sentece: Oral ibandronate is rapidly absorbed (t(max) < 1 hour), with a low bioavailability (0.63%) that is further reduced (by up to 90%) in the presence of food.

Sentece: Given its metabolic stability, ibandronate is eliminated from the blood by partitioning into bone (40%-50%) and through renal clearance (CL(R) approximately 60 mL/min).
